ygData.subject: Re: TWINKING-- a discussion
ygData.msgSnippet: Alright... this is something I ve always been two minds about. If someone s worked hard enough to be able to earn such powerful items... I have no
ygData.messageBody:
Alright... this is something I've always been two
minds about.<br><br>If someone's worked hard enough to
be able to earn such powerful items... I have no
problems with twinking -- TO a CERTAIN
degree...<br><br>Quest creatures that are hard to camp should be
unreasonable... but there are certain items that are hard to get
but are common loots for certain mobs. I don't like
that idea that ppl would deprive hard to camp mobs
from others needing it...<br><br>But I have no problem
if you twink using something that you would have
just sold anyway for a few extra plat. Maybe even if
it's just rare stuff you buy from auction for another
character.<br><br>Why? B/c I've benefitted too often from grouping with
twinked characters. Times when we should have zoned and
run... we've stayed and I've healed the tank or what
not.<br><br>I myself am not twink and horribly underpowered for
most level 30 druids. (I don't have a 200 wis. I get
soooo ridiculed by almost every party I've been in b/c
of that that I've stopped tell ppl my wis at
times).<br><br>shooman out<br>Fatedhue Prismatic of the Drinal
Server<br><br>PS... on the flirting thing. Sigh. I'm guilty. I feel
bad about that. Ahhh well. At least I haven't been so
bad that anyone's called me on it or not wanted to
add me to the friends list. =)<br><br>PPS... as with
most things in life.. best judgement should be used. A
code of ethics and respect for other players.
<br><br>shoomie out
